page.title: 12LAW AND ORDER IN HEDON
page.content: {Hedon Police Station}is situated on New Road and is not continuously manned.It is open for a few hours three days a week.There are eight police officers serving the station plus our local community police officer. {Reporting for duty.}When police officers report for duty they must have with them five{appointments.} Appointments are the items of equipment every police officer must carry eg.a radio,pen,pad,handcuffs, and a warrant card which is a police officer's identity card. {The Local Community Police Officer}is an important person.His job is to get to know the people of Hedon and become involved in local activities. He is there to help us.
